code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Form,Input,Modal,Radio}from'antd';import inviteService from'../../../services/seller/invites';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{fetchInvites}from'../../../redux/slices/invite';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function InviteModal(_ref){let{inviteId:data,handleCancel}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslation();const[form]=Form.useForm();const dispatch=useDispatch();const[loadingBtn,setLoadingBtn]=useState(false);const onFinish=values=>{const params={role:values.role};setLoadingBtn(true);inviteService.statusUpdate(data.id,params).then(()=>{handleCancel();dispatch(fetchInvites());}).finally(()=>setLoadingBtn(false));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{title:t('accept.invite'),visible:!!data,onCancel:handleCancel,footer:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",onClick:()=>form.submit(),loading:loadingBtn,children:t('save')},'save-btn'),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"default",onClick:handleCancel,children:t('cancel')},'cancel-btn')],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{form:form,layout:"vertical",onFinish:onFinish,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{label:t('user'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{value:data.user.firstname+' '+data.user.lastname,disabled:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Item,{label:t('select.role'),name:"role",rules:[{required:true,message:t('required')}],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Radio.Group,{optionType:"button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:'moderator',children:t('moderator')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:'deliveryman',children:t('deliveryman')})]})})]})});}
